headline: Is It Time To Reassess Avery Dennison (AVY) After Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: If you are wondering whether Avery Dennison shares still offer value at around US$195.80, it helps to step back and look at what the current price might be implying about the company. The stock has posted returns of 3.3% over the last 7 days, 3.8% over 30 days, 7.3% year to date and 10.1% over 1 year, with a 3 year return of 13.3% and 5 year return of 23.5%. This gives investors some context for how the share price has behaved recently. Recent company news has kept Avery Dennison on...
